resources.name: /users
resources.description:
cpf and profile_img are optional fields.

is_adm is also optional and defaults to false.

```response:201
{
    "name": "Example User Name",
    "is_adm": true,
    "email": "example.user@mail.com",
    "cpf": null,
    "profile_img": null,
    "id": "2a199074-65a1-4a98-9274-99ff3ca46378"
}
```

resources.name: /users
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Returns data of logged in user. If user is admin, returns data of all users. ```response:200 { "id": "6fbaddd5-64fa-4a32-98a3-6f10b4c284fe", "name": "Example Name", "email": "example@mail.com", "is_adm": false, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "img_url" } ```

resources.name: /users/:id
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Update informations of the logged in user. Editable fields: - name - email - cpf - profile_img ```response:200 { "id": "6fbaddd5-64fa-4a32-98a3-6f10b4c284fe", "name": "New Name", "email": "example@mail.com", "is_adm": false, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "new_img_url" } ```

resources.name: /users/:id
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### On success, returns status code 204.

resources.name: /forgot
resources.description:
Require a password reset (sends an email to the user with a four-digit verification code).


```response:200
{
    "code": 3872,
    "expiryDate": 1667570219467
}
```

resources.name: /forgot/verify
resources.description:
Verifies the validity of the code send to the user's email.

```response:200
{
    "id": "d64c4f0e-1845-4e69-b383-6a0113d867fe",
    "name": "Daniel",
    "password": "$2b$10$ZNduCoz3FEpcNvrKaUFHoO0O1MC2nbnhqisY65n0vyyDGVT1J.A7a",
    "email": "dan_mtk@hotmail.com",
    "is_adm": true,
    "cpf": null,
    "profile_img": null,
    "reset_password_token": "2806",
    "reset_password_expires": "2022-11-04T13:45:32.188Z"
}
```

resources.name: /forgot/:code
resources.description:
Set a new password after email verification has been confirmed.

Verification code should be sent as url param ":code"

resources.name: /login
/pets
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### ```response:201 { "id": "593641f7-cc4a-4d49-9858-a13fb584123c", "name": "Doggy", "type": "dog", "age": "5 months", "neutered": false, "vaccinated": true, "docile": true, "user": { "id": "2a199074-65a1-4a98-9274-99ff3ca46378", "name": "Example User Name", "email": "example.user@mail.com", "is_adm": true, "cpf": null, "profile_img": null } } ```

resources.name: /pets
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Returns all pets of the logged in user. If user is admin, returns all registered pets. ```response:200 [ { "id": "262991e7-ebe0-4c40-bc5c-388e041fe136", "name": "doguinho", "type": "dog", "age": "5 anos", "neutered": true, "vaccinated": true, "docile": true, "owner": { "id": "3d0badb3-831f-465a-9916-16bac7b9149a", "name": "New Name", "email": "nicholas.ge1301@gmail.com", "is_adm": true, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "new_img_url" } }, { "id": "8b884f82-2fd0-43a8-98fa-eec3c39f9236", "name": "otro dog", "type": "dog", "age": "5 meses", "neutered": true, "vaccinated": true, "docile": true, "owner": { "id": "3d0badb3-831f-465a-9916-16bac7b9149a", "name": "New Name", "email": "nicholas.ge1301@gmail.com", "is_adm": true, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "new_img_url" } }, ... ] ```

resources.name: /pets/:id
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Editable fields: - name - vaccinated - neutered - docile ```response:200 { "id": "6d324bed-d055-4fbb-a38f-dbc34ab8c226", "name": "Pet Name", "type": "dog", "age": "5 months", "neutered": true, "vaccinated": true, "docile": true } ```

resources.name: /pets/:id
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Pets which have already been booked for a resevation cannot be deleted (even if said reservation has alreaedy been cancelled). On success, returns status code 204.

resources.name: /reservations
/reservations
/reservations/:id
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### On success, returns status code 204.

resources.name: /rooms/dates/:roomTypeId
resources.description:
Returns an array of dates in which a given room type is unavailable

```response:200
[
    "2022-04-11T00:00:00.000Z",
    "2022-04-12T00:00:00.000Z",
    "2022-04-13T00:00:00.000Z"
]
```

resources.name: /rooms/types
resources.description:
Returns all available room types.


resources.name: /rooms
/reviews
resources.description: ### Requires authentication ### Creates a review of a reservation. User must have created the reservation to be able to review it, and the reservation must have been concluded (past checkout date). ```response:201 { "id": "e927579a-9d5c-4e41-943e-9f775120d83b", "review_text": "example review", "stars": 5, "user": { "id": "3d0badb3-831f-465a-9916-16bac7b9149a", "name": "New Name", "email": "nicholas.ge1301@gmail.com", "is_adm": true, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "new_img_url" }, "reservation": { "id": "b9191674-43e9-400b-98ad-1f09ce3d1ece", "checkin": "2023-04-01T00:00:00.000Z", "checkout": "2023-04-07T00:00:00.000Z", "status": "reserved", "created_at": "2022-11-05T23:42:53.918Z", "updated_at": "2022-11-05T23:42:53.918Z" } } ```

resources.name: /reviews
resources.description: ### GET /reviews ### Returns all users' reviews. ```response:200 [ { "id": "439f5518-1dbe-405c-ae39-85893c9ec58b", "review_text": "new review text", "stars": "4.0", "user": { "id": "6fbaddd5-64fa-4a32-98a3-6f10b4c284fe", "name": "New Name", "email": "zezinho@mail.com", "is_adm": false, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "new_img_url" }, "reservation": { "id": "1b6bd221-7b54-46b1-82cf-08865af121f4", "checkin": "2022-11-09T00:00:00.000Z", "checkout": "2022-11-15T00:00:00.000Z", "status": "active", "created_at": "2022-11-07T20:34:52.476Z", "updated_at": "2022-11-09T17:45:43.392Z" } }, { "id": "37f47c63-32ce-4c90-b7ac-d5894e65805d", "review_text": "Adorei a estadiaa", "stars": "5.0", "user": { "id": "30ba4398-e241-49f8-8ae5-1f3d66388225", "name": "Guilherme", "email": "gui.wustro@gmail.com", "is_adm": false, "cpf": null, "profile_img": "https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ALm5wu2RL10wwP36-4RXl8Hj8pB_l0k9g0qMW7CIKWWs=s96-c" }, "reservation": { "id": "f761ac3c-c44a-4409-9b92-2c1978735344", "checkin": "2022-10-21T00:00:00.000Z", "checkout": "2022-10-23T00:00:00.000Z", "status": "concluded", "created_at": "2022-11-09T14:14:15.020Z", "updated_at": "2022-11-09T14:14:15.020Z" } } ] ```
